cover.desc: Web Developer | Social Media Manager | Private Pilot

about.title: Let me tell you something about me
about.desc: I'm passionate about technology and businesses. Always learning trends and updating projects, I love innovation and creative solutions. I have the experience from +5 years working for Entrepreneurs and Local Shops using Digital Marketing to get their goals. I would like to develop webs with the newest technology for your projects. We can create uniques things, let's talk!

projects.title: My Projects
projects.ToDoApp: In this application you can create, edit and delete tasks. It is made with React and CSS. It is stored in the browser. Each task has its date and time.
projects.AppAviones: This app is a hanged style game, where you must guess the image plane, React and CSS is used
projects.Pilotfy: I work in this brand in the creation of content for your social networks with the theme of aviation, we have had very good results in the use of educational carousels
projects.AlphaPergamino: We have made production of videos, photos and content with the community. I PERFORMANCE ALL THE SOCIAL MEDIA STRATEGY
projects.AlphaWeb: I made this website with React and Tailwind CSS for the Alpha Pergamino brand, thus being able to offer its air walking flight services and pilot training
projects.ListaGastos: This project is a Expenses Manager, you can add Expenses with their category and dates. I used React Hooks, Custom Hooks, Functional Components, Webpack, Tailwind Css, Api Context, React Router, Firebase for Authentication and Firestore Database.

info.text: Let's work together and create something unique.
